statements: SELECT * FROM endangered_marine_species
SELECT species_name, population FROM endangered_marine_species WHERE species_id = 1
SELECT species_name, conservation_area FROM endangered_marine_species WHERE population > 1000
SELECT * FROM endangered_marine_species WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM endangered_marine_species ORDER BY conservation_area DESC
SELECT * FROM endangered_marine_species WHERE conservation_area='Pacific Ocean' ORDER BY species_name DESC, population ASC
SELECT species_name, population FROM endangered_marine_species WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY population DESC
SELECT species_id, species_name, conservation_area, population FROM endangered_marine_species WHERE conservation_area='Atlantic Ocean' AND population < 5000
SELECT species_id, species_name, conservation_area FROM endangered_marine_species ORDER BY species_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_species, AVG(population) AS avg_population FROM endangered_marine_species
SELECT * FROM ConservationAreas;
SELECT area_name FROM ConservationAreas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE population_count > 1000;
SELECT area_name, species_name FROM ConservationAreas, EndangeredSpecies WHERE ConservationAreas.area_id = EndangeredSpecies.conservation_area_id;
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE population_count > 100 ORDER BY species_name ASC
SELECT species_name, population_count, area_name FROM EndangeredSpecies INNER JOIN ConservationAreas ON EndangeredSpecies.conservation_area_id = ConservationAreas.area_id WHERE population_count < 50
SELECT area_name, COUNT(species_id) AS total_species FROM ConservationAreas LEFT JOIN EndangeredSpecies ON ConservationAreas.area_id = EndangeredSpecies.conservation_area_id GROUP BY area_name
SELECT DISTINCT area_name FROM ConservationAreas WHERE area_id IN (SELECT conservation_area_id FROM EndangeredSpecies)
SELECT MAX(population_count) AS max_population, MIN(population_count) AS min_population FROM EndangeredSpecies
SELECT * FROM ConservationAreas;
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM ConservationAreas ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PopulationRecords WHERE population_count > 1000;
SELECT species_name, species_description FROM MarineSpecies WHERE species_id = 3;
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM ConservationAreas WHERE area_location LIKE '%National Park%';
SELECT * FROM ConservationAreas WHERE area_location = 'Forest'
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM ConservationAreas WHERE area_location LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY area_name DESC
SELECT C.area_name, P.species_id, M.species_name FROM ConservationAreas C INNER JOIN PopulationRecords P ON C.area_id = P.area_id INNER JOIN MarineSpecies M ON P.species_id = M.species_id
SELECT MAX(population_count) AS max_population FROM PopulationRecords
SELECT area_name, COUNT(*) AS total_population FROM ConservationAreas C INNER JOIN PopulationRecords P ON C.area_id = P.area_id GROUP BY area_name HAVING total_population > 100
SELECT * FROM ConservationAreas;
SELECT area_name, location FROM ConservationAreas;
SELECT species_name, scientific_name, conservation_status FROM MarineSpecies;
SELECT * FROM SpeciesPopulation WHERE population > 100;
SELECT staff_name, role FROM ConservationStaff WHERE conservation_area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ConservationAreas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT area_name, location FROM ConservationAreas WHERE id = 2;
SELECT species_name, scientific_name, conservation_status FROM MarineSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT staff_name, role FROM ConservationStaff ORDER BY staff_name ASC;

SELECT c.area_name, s.species_name, sp.population FROM ConservationAreas c JOIN SpeciesPopulation sp ON c.id = sp.conservation_area_id JOIN MarineSpecies s ON sp.species_id = s.species_id WHERE sp.population > 1000 ORDER BY sp.population DESC;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_area = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT * FROM sightings ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, specialty FROM researchers WHERE specialty = 'Ornithology';
SELECT area_name, location FROM conservation_areas WHERE area_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM endangered_species WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT species_name, conservation_area FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_area = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT species_name, population_size, conservation_area FROM endangered_species ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM sightings WHERE observation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND observation_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT researcher_name, specialty FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
